questions.questionTitle: What are the speakers mainly talking about?
How does the man feel about his dining experience?
What will the speakers discuss next?

script:
� That was better than I expected. The service was a little slow, but the salad was huge, and my chicken was excellent! What did you think?
� My steak was a little too rare, but the soup was very good. I agree the service was slow, but they were busy tonight.
� Yeah, I'm just happy we could get Friday reservations on such short notice.
� Yes. And the evening's still young. So....?
